entities.name: ravenclaw
entities.description: The Ravenclaw end is mentioned as a location in the text where Harry and Cho are competing.

entities.name: cho
entities.description: Cho is mentioned as a person who is competing with Harry. She screams 'Oh!' when she sees something.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the text, competing against Cho and trying to catch the Snitch.

entities.name: snitch
entities.description: The Snitch is an object that Harry is trying to catch. It is described as small and struggling.

entities.name: dementors
entities.description: Dementors are creatures that appear in the text, described as tall, black, and hooded. Harry uses his wand to cast a spell against them.

relationships.description: Harry is competing at the Ravenclaw end, which is mentioned as a location in the text.
Cho and Harry are competitors, trying to catch the Snitch. This relationship is established through their actions and dialogue in the text.
Harry is trying to catch the Snitch, which is his target. This relationship is established through Harry's actions and dialogue in the text.
Harry uses his wand to cast a spell against the Dementors, which are creatures that appear in the text. This relationship is established through Harry's actions and dialogue in the text.
